column5: looking for input from fellow members having experience with this unit.  it's on sale this week at CT for $199.  have one on hold to pick up before Thursday, but looking for input, good and bad.  going on a 18' Princecraft, late 70's range, with a 60hp Johnson.  looking for a pic to give you an idea, will post later.  i think 40lb thrust transom mount should be fine for whitie/laker jigging, pike/bass excusions.   thanks, Jesse  ** can't get pic to load from photobucket of the boat...any help?**

If you need more time to think. No need to jump the gun, LeBaron has the Endura 40 for $194.94 everyday.   *whoops, just noticed that you are in Barrie... so LeBaron might be quite out of the way in Markham.....

IMO 40lbs isint enough for that large of a boat..I just went thru this on the weekend..Does that transom mount motor come with a foot pedal? Do any transom mounts come with a foot pedal for that matter?
It's to light.  Go bigger. You will regret getting the 40#.
i just picked u the 55lb powerdrive $568.00 at crappy tire..$100 off on sale all week
just bought a 40 for my tinnie ,, you're under-powered.
are you pulling water skiers? LOL
used 3o lb's before didn't cut it in the wind, was disappointed
Yikes I just picked up a 55lb powerdrive for my 14.5.. However I fully expect a new boat in the near future so i made sure I bought one that will work on a 17 or 18 ft
thanks to all replied.  decided to hold out for something bigger.  55lb or more.  i would rather be over powered than under!!  thanks again!
